AccountSettings.description: Link multiple accounts to access your spaces from different providers.
AccountSettings.errorMinimumIdentity: You must keep at least one linked account
AccountSettings.errorProviderNotLinked: The specified provider is not linked
AccountSettings.note: After linking accounts, you can sign in with any of them. You must keep at least one account linked.

AccountSettings.unlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlink your {provider} account?

Admin.avatarDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the uploaded avatar? This action cannot be undone.
Admin.avatarDeleteUploadDescription: Delete the uploaded avatar image from storage. The user's avatar will be reset to default.
Admin.avatarIsDefault: User is currently using the default avatar.
Admin.avatarResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the user's avatar to default? This will hide provider avatars.
Admin.avatarResetDescription: Reset the user's avatar to the default. This will hide any provider avatars (Google, Twitch) from display.
Admin.banConfirm: Are you sure you want to BAN user {email}? This action cannot be undone.
Admin.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this space? This action cannot be undone. (It will be archived)
Admin.errorStorageDeleteFailed: Failed to delete avatar from storage
Admin.metaDescription: Manage spaces, users, authentication providers, and system settings
Admin.overviewCommunityDescription: As a site administrator, you can manage all spaces and users.
Admin.overviewWarningNote2: • User ban completely deletes the account
Admin.subtitle: Site administrator control panel

AdminAuthProviders.description: Manage which authentication providers are available on the login page
AdminAuthProviders.title: Authentication Providers

AdminSettings.defaultUserRoleHelp: Default role automatically assigned to newly registered users. "Organizer" can create spaces, "User" can only participate.
AdminSettings.description: Configure server resource management and space limits
AdminSettings.errorInvalidData: The settings data retrieved from the database is invalid. Please check the database.
AdminSettings.featureFlagsDescription: Enable or disable specific features across the system
AdminSettings.gatekeeperRequirementTypeHelp: Control which requirement types are available for selection in space settings
AdminSettings.maxParticipantsHelp: Set the maximum number of participants allowed in a single space
AdminSettings.maxSpacesPerUserHelp: Set the maximum number of spaces a user can create
AdminSettings.maxTotalSpacesHelp: Set the maximum total number of spaces allowed system-wide (0 for unlimited)
AdminSettings.spaceExpirationHelp: Set how many hours after creation a space expires (0 for unlimited)
AdminSettings.title: System Settings
AdminSettings.warningInvalidFields: Some settings are using default values due to invalid data
AdminSettings.warningInvalidFieldsDescription: The following fields had issues: {fields}. Saving will update them with the displayed values.

AdminSpace.closeSpaceConfirm: Are you sure you want to close this space? After closing, the participation URL will become invalid. This action cannot be undone.
AdminSpace.closeSpaceDescription: Closing the space will invalidate the participation URL. Users who have already joined will not be affected.
AdminSpace.dangerZoneDescription: Proceed with caution. These actions cannot be undone.
AdminSpace.draftMainHint: Use the Settings button at the top to configure your space before publishing.
AdminSpace.draftMainMessage: This space is not yet published. Configure your settings and click the button below when you're ready to start.
AdminSpace.draftStatusMessage: This space is not yet published. Review the settings and publish it when ready.
AdminSpace.heading: Admin Dashboard
AdminSpace.kickConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this space?
AdminSpace.participantsErrorFetch: Failed to load participants. Please try refreshing the page.
AdminSpace.resetGameConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the game? All called numbers will be cleared.
AdminSpace.resetGameDescription: Clear all called numbers and restart the game from the beginning.

AvatarSettings.description: Select which avatar to display from your linked accounts.
AvatarSettings.errorProviderNotLinked: This provider is not linked to your account

AvatarUpload.description: Upload JPEG, PNG, or WebP images (max 2MB)

AvatarUpload.errorInvalidFileType: Only JPEG, PNG, and WebP images are allowed

Contact.autoFillLoginPrompt: Please log in to auto-fill with your information
Contact.completeEmailNote: We will reply to this email address:
Contact.completeMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We will review your message and get back to you soon.
Contact.description: Have questions or feedback? Feel free to reach out to us.
Contact.messageDescription: Please provide as much detail as possible
Contact.metaDescription: Contact us with your questions or feedback
Contact.title: Contact Us

CreateSpace.emailAllowlistHelp: To restrict participants by email address, enter allowed domains (@example.com or example.com) or email addresses (user@example.com) separated by commas or newlines. Leave empty for no restrictions.
CreateSpace.maxParticipantsHelp: Set the maximum number of participants allowed to join the space (1-1000 people)
CreateSpace.settingsNotice: After creation, you can configure participant limits and other settings on the settings page
CreateSpace.twitchBroadcasterIdHelp: Enter the broadcaster ID (numeric). Leave empty for no restrictions.
CreateSpace.youtubeChannelIdHelp: Enter a YouTube channel ID to require participants to subscribe to that channel before joining.

Dashboard.closeConfirm: Are you sure you want to close this space? Participants will no longer be able to join or play.
Dashboard.createFormDescription: Fill in the required information to start your bingo event right away.
Dashboard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this space? This action cannot be undone.
Dashboard.metaDescription: Create and manage your bingo spaces. View active events and space history.

DisplaySettings.backgroundDescription: Change the screen background color. Transparent and chroma key (green/blue) options are available for streaming.
DisplaySettings.description: Manage the viewing URL and configure screen display settings.
DisplaySettings.displayModeDescription: Choose between full layout (current number + history grid) or minimal (current number only).
DisplaySettings.heading: Display Settings
DisplaySettings.localeDescription: Choose the language for the screen display.
DisplaySettings.regenerateConfirm: The old URL will become invalid. Are you sure you want to continue?
DisplaySettings.themeDescription: Choose between light and dark theme for text and UI elements.

EmailChangeSettings.confirmationEmailSent: Verification email has been sent to your new email address. Please click the link in the email to complete the change.
EmailChangeSettings.description: Change the email address linked to your account. You will receive a confirmation link at your new email address.
EmailChangeSettings.emailHelp: A verification link will be sent to this address
EmailChangeSettings.errorEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
EmailChangeSettings.errorSameEmail: This is your current email address
EmailChangeSettings.title: Email Settings

Errors.maxSpacesReached: You have reached the maximum limit of {max} spaces. Please delete unused spaces.
Errors.maxTotalSpacesReached: System capacity reached. Please contact admin.
Errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to edit this space

Faq.answer1: No, it's completely free. Account registration is free, and you can use all features without any restrictions. There are no paid plans or hidden costs.
Faq.answer2: Each space can accommodate up to {maxParticipants} concurrent participants. This limit can be adjusted by the system administrator in the settings.
Faq.answer3: Spaces expire {expirationHours, plural, =0 {indefinitely} other {after {expirationHours} hours from creation}}. Data from completed spaces is retained as an archive for a certain period and then automatically deleted.
Faq.answer4: Yes, absolutely! You can use Bingify freely for both personal and commercial purposes at no cost.
Faq.answer5: Yes! Bingify is an open-source project under the MIT License. You can view, modify, and contribute to the source code on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink>.
Faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.question1: Is there any cost to use it?
Faq.question2: Is there a limit on the number of participants?
Faq.question4: Can I use it for commercial purposes?

Features.communityDescription: Perfect for community events, streams, and parties. Easy to join with OAuth sign-in and enjoy together.
Features.heading: Why Choose Bingify
Features.noAppDescription: No app installation required. Share a URL and sign in from your browser to join instantly.
Features.realtimeDescription: Real-time communication ensures all screens update simultaneously. Experience unity without delay.
Features.subheading: Simple, powerful. A new bingo experience for everyone.

Hero.description: Experience a new kind of bingo that brings everyone together in real-time.
Hero.descriptionLine2: Sign in with Google or Twitch and get started instantly.
Hero.title: Turn Every Screen Into

Login.description: Sign in to host games or manage your account.
Login.descriptionSpace: Sign in to join this bingo space and participate in the game.

Login.errorEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
Login.errorMessage: An error occurred during sign-in. Please try again.
Login.metaDescription: Sign in to Bingify to create bingo spaces, host events, and manage your account.

Metadata.description: Experience a new kind of bingo that brings everyone together in real-time. Sign in with OAuth and get started easily.
Metadata.title: Bingify - Turn Every Screen Into A Venue of Excitement.

NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

OAuth.errorInsufficientPermissions: Insufficient OAuth permissions. Please reconnect your account with the required permissions.
OAuth.errorNetworkError: Network error occurred while verifying your account. Please try again.
OAuth.errorTokenDeleted: Your OAuth token has been deleted due to invalid credentials. Please reconnect your account.
OAuth.errorTokenExpired: Your OAuth token has expired or been revoked. Please reconnect your account.
OAuth.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred during OAuth verification. Please try again.

ScreenView.invalidToken: This URL is invalid or has been regenerated.

Setup.description1: You are about to become the first administrator of this Bingify instance.
Setup.description2: As an admin, you will have full control over all spaces and users.

errors.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.errorSetupCompleted: Setup has already been completed. An admin user already exists.
errors.errorUnauthorized: You must be signed in to claim admin role.

Setup.subtitle: Initial Administrator Setup
Setup.title: Welcome to Bingify
Setup.warningMessage: This action can only be performed once. After claiming admin role, this setup page will no longer be accessible.

SpaceSettings.helpOAuthRequired: To use social integration, please complete OAuth authentication for Google (for YouTube) or Twitch from <accountLink>Account Settings</accountLink>.

SpaceSettings.hideMetadataHelp: When enabled, non-participants will only see a 'Private Space' message without title or description
SpaceSettings.hideMetadataLabel: Hide title and description from non-participants

SpaceSettings.noneModeDescription: Anyone with the share key can join.

SpaceSettings.titleHelp: Set a display name for the space
SpaceSettings.twitchBroadcasterIdHelp: Enter broadcaster's username, channel URL, or numeric ID. Use 'Get My ID' button to auto-fill. Examples: ninja, https://twitch.tv/ninja, 123456789
SpaceSettings.twitchBroadcasterIdInvalid: Invalid input. Please enter a username, channel URL, or numeric ID.
SpaceSettings.warningRequirementDisabled: The currently selected requirement type is disabled in system settings. Please select a valid requirement.
SpaceSettings.youtubeChannelIdHelp: Enter a channel ID, handle (@username), or channel URL. Use 'Get My ID' button to auto-fill. Examples: UCxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx, @GoogleDevelopers, https://www.youtube.com/@GoogleDevelopers

Support.description: Bingify is an open-source project maintained by volunteers. Your support helps cover hosting costs and enables continued development.
